version.author: mccrabney
version.changelog: + general cleanup, excessive comments in code + an attempt to use MIDI_Sort properly + RE movement: added undo points + MIDI edits: added "select last hit notes in RE" + MIDI edits: if no REs exist, enclose selected items in RE then run edit + MIDI edits: nudge last-hit note in RE
